params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instance
params.description: Required. Resource name of the Memcached instance for which software update should be applied.

params.name: data.node_ids
params.description: Nodes to which we should apply the update to. Note all the selected nodes are updated in parallel.

params.name: data.apply_all
params.description: Whether to apply the update to all nodes. If set to true, will explicitly restrict users from specifying any nodes, and apply software update to all nodes (where applicable) within the instance.
